MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath. We did not know in advance there would be power issues, however our engineers are on site and in order to carry out a safe repair to the complex underground cable fault on Main Street, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:28am on 19th January
